title: An American Crime Story Versace Special
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I loved this interview! And I grew up during the Aids epidemic and Versace eras. Even though I was very young I remember everything and I mean. Everything, the times were exciting, worry some, beautiful, painful, joyous. And I concur that they did focus on whether Andrew was really gay or just. In the media’s words “a predator trying to survive”. I have to check on American Crime Story, it seems as though I have missed out on a lot.
This is very cool, so sorry I missed it.

The show was named after VERSACE..yes there were other murders, however, the show was centered around him for a reason. I think Ryan did an awesome job showing a little of each of the victims lives. Anymore and we would’ve complained about too much time being spent on them
description:
Welcome to a special live stream with MaryGirl Moody and Michael Wright. Today I'm talking #AndrewCunanan and #DavidMadson with Michael, who knew both Cunanan and Madson.
--Special thank you to Michael Wright for joining me today.--

► ► SUBSCRIBE
